attack_string.title: attack_string
attack_string.description: The Attack String to give. This needs to be the ID of the attack string internally. Leave blank if you don't want this to be used. Valid inputs: sword_light, sword_heavy, axe_light, axe_heavy, bow_long, bow_short, catalyst_wand, catalyst_tome, catalyst_staff, scythe_normal, spear_normal, dagger_normal, dagger_throw (For dagger_throw, be sure they have a SF Dagger equipped)

string_delay.title: string_delay
string_delay.description: The amount of delay of attack after they successfully finish 1 attack string combo. This is in ticks.
